Content.Text:
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why hello there, <MYNAME>. What are you
doing here?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Me? Oh, I'm just out for walk. At my age
you appreciate a moment of tranquility!
This town is so lovely, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hey, is that a fishing rod you've got
there? You like fishing, do you?
<PAGE>
I've got an idea, <MYNAME>. Would you show
me the spot you normally fish in?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You've certainly got this fishing thing
down, haven't you! You look very cool,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's something I want to ask you,
actually.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You might not think it to look at me,
but I'm a journalist by trade. I'm not
working at the moment, but still.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>It kinda comes with the job, then, that
if there's something I'm curious about,
I can't rest until I know all about it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So what I'd like to ask is... why are
you working so hard to restore this
town?
<PAGE>
I'd like to know why this place is so
special for you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Y-You're serious? Yes, you are, I can
tell.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I've been a journalist for a long time,
but I've come across few people who are
quite as direct as you!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, don't take that the wrong way! I'm
not mocking you or anything. In fact, I
think it's quite wonderful!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I think I'm starting to become
interested in what makes you tick.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, you're good! I like fishing too,
actually.
<PAGE>
I think we could become good fishing
buddies, <MYNAME>, what do you think?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That fish is for me? Thank you, <MYNAME>.
I'll enjoy that tonight.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I'd better get back to the
business of my walk!
<PAGE>
You keep at it, <MYNAME>. I'll support you
however I can to make sure all your hard
work pays off.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Yes, of course. You're right, it was
rude of me to suddenly just ask you
that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Sorry, it was my mistake. Sorry for
asking you to show me your fishing, too.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll just get back to my walk. See you
again sometime, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wah, I think you've hooked a lunker!
<MYNAME>, reel it in! You can do it!
